references.reason: This paper is a technical report on GPT-4, a leading proprietary large language model used as a comparison model in the paper's experiments.
As a leading proprietary vision-language model, GPT-4V is used as a comparison model throughout the paper's benchmarks.

references.paper_title: Expanding performance boundaries of open-source multimodal models with model, data, and test-time scaling
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it introduces InternVL2.5, a strong open-source model used as a major baseline for comparison and analysis.

references.paper_title: Qwen2-vl: Enhancing vision-language model's perception of the world at any resolution
references.reason: Qwen2-VL serves as the foundational model for Tarsier2, making it a crucial reference for understanding the architectural choices and pre-training strategies.

references.paper_title: Tarsier: Recipes for training and evaluating large video description models
references.reason: Tarsier is the predecessor model to Tarsier2, providing essential context for understanding the improvements and advancements made in the current work.
